Package Operation
formerly, the series of programs offered by the Network were sent out
in individual series and scheduled separately. Starting with these
Fall series, the programs will be distributed in packages 0
That is to say, each week’s program of the above series will be contained
in the same package. This package will remain couplete all throughout
its circuit of the leg. This is how it will work.
Program #1 of Series £l-7 through £L©3li are packaed in one box. The box
is mailed to Station X, the first station on the leg. Station X sched¬
ules the programs during the week of September 16-22 as agreed upon
with Network headquarters. Then the whole package is shipped complete
to the next station. A week is allowed in-between stations for mailing.
So Station Y, the next station on the leg, schedules and plays Program
#1 of the above series during the week of September 30-October 6.
And so forth down the leg. likewise, the procedure is the same for
Package #2.
Enclosed are copies of schedules for all eight legs.
The Future
The above two packages are by no means all the programs that are to be
offered during the coming year. Pride and Prejudice, the Cumberland
Festival Concerts are among those new programs being readied for future
distribution.
